item.description:
Embrace Wellness—starting here and now.

Anytime is a good time to start embracing a healthy lifestyle. Plus Size Yoga Meetup is a 90-minute yoga workshop is aimed at offering full figured women a judgment free space to embrace and support each other in a healthy lifestyle. It is more than a yoga class.

Learn to use yoga and yogic principles to guide you to a vibrant life full of energy, freedom, and peace. This is a friendly, welcoming, and safe environment to explore yoga, nutrition, and topics that are specific to the lives and concerns of full figured women and women in general. Class taught by Annika Nilsson Ripps, RYT.

Join us to recharge and refocus so that you can have the vitality and joyful life you want—starting here and now.

Next Meetup Time: Friday, Sept 4th , 7:00pm – 8:30pm

Location: Absolute Yoga, 77 West Main St. 2nd floor. Hopkinton, MA (near 495)

Cost: $15 for Plus Size Yoga Meetup Members! $18 for non-members.

Special Promotion: If you register for the Sept/Oct Plus Size Yoga session, you can attend the Sept Meetup for free! Register for the next 7 week session ($105) at this link.

Update: Next weekly Plus Size Yoga class (Sundays, 5pm) will be back starting Sunday, Sept 13th.

About Us: The Plus Size Yoga for Women Meetup is led by Annika Nilsson Ripps, a certified Viniyoga instructor through FRA, as well as a certified Personal Trainer through the American College of Sports Medicine
Absolute Yoga instructors are dedicated to providing quality, creative and safe Yoga instruction to new and experienced students of all ages, backgrounds and ability. Absolute Yoga offers a variety of adult Yoga and Pilates classes during the weekdays, evenings and weekends as well as a comprehensive Growing Families yoga program with Prenatal Yoga and yoga for newborns through age 4. Absolute Yoga is proud to lend their expertise and support to the Plus Size Yoga for Women Meetup. Check it out!

group.name: Plus Size Yoga Meetup for Women

item.name: Plus Size Yoga for Women (Sept Meetup)
